sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY where 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and QYRQ > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select QYRQ from JXDX_WYQY where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_WYQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH as HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH as JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH as JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH as KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY=JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_WYQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG771 on KHDX_JG771.JGDH=JXDX_WYQY.JGDH where 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_WYQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' group by JXDX_WYQY.KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_WYQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH as HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH as JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH as JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH as KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY=JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_WYQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG771 on KHDX_JG771.JGDH=JXDX_WYQY.JGDH where 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%'
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_WYQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' group by JXDX_WYQY.KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_WYQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH as HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH as JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH as JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH as KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY=JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_WYQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG771 on KHDX_JG771.JGDH=JXDX_WYQY.JGDH where 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_WYQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' group by JXDX_WYQY.KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_WYQY.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH as HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH as JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH as JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH as KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC as JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY as QYKEY, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY left outer join dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY=JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_WYQY.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JG KHDX_JG771 on KHDX_JG771.JGDH=JXDX_WYQY.JGDH where 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%'
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_WYQY.KHH like '%$KHH$%' group by JXDX_WYQY.KHMC,JXDX_WYQY.HTH,JXDX_WYQY.CXRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JGDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYRQ,JXDX_WYQY.JYZH,JXDX_WYQY.KHH,KHDX_JG771.JGMC,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY order by JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh inner join JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY on 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY=dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' order by dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_WSYH.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh dxgx_yjgx_wsyh inner join JXDX_WYQY JXDX_WYQY on 1=1 and JXDX_WYQY.QYKEY=dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' order by dxgx_yjgx_wsyh.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_wsyh set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_wsyh set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_wsyh set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh where 1=1 and QYKEY = '$QYKEY$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_WSYH(JLDH,GGBZ,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZLBL) select $JLDH$,'$GGBZ$',gx.KHDXDH,gx.QSRQ,gx.JSRQ,gx.ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_wsyh gx where 1=1 and gx.QYKEY = '$QYKEY$' and jsrq=29991231
